    A generic function to create a tibble structure for a measure of association

    assoc_tibble.Rd

    Creates a tibble for every variable pair in a dataset with a measure of association

    Usage

    assoc_tibble(data, measure_type = "?", pair_type = "?")

# S3 method for matrix
assoc_tibble(data, measure_type = "?", pair_type = "?")

# S3 method for data.frame
assoc_tibble(data, measure_type = NA_character_, pair_type = NA_character_)

    Arguments

    data

    A dataframe

    measure_type

    a character string indicating the measure of association

    Value

    A tibble structure of variable pairs and measure of association

    Methods (by class)

    • assoc_tibble(matrix): assoc_tibble method

    • assoc_tibble(data.frame): assoc_tibble method

    Examples

    assoc_tibble(cor(iris[,1:4]), measure_type="pearson")
#> # A tibble: 6 × 5
#>   x            y            measure measure_type pair_type
#>   <chr>        <chr>          <dbl> <chr>        <chr>    
#> 1 Sepal.Width  Sepal.Length  -0.118 pearson      ?        
#> 2 Petal.Length Sepal.Length   0.872 pearson      ?        
#> 3 Petal.Width  Sepal.Length   0.818 pearson      ?        
#> 4 Petal.Length Sepal.Width   -0.428 pearson      ?        
#> 5 Petal.Width  Sepal.Width   -0.366 pearson      ?        
#> 6 Petal.Width  Petal.Length   0.963 pearson      ?        
assoc_tibble(iris)
#> # A tibble: 10 × 5
#>    x            y            measure measure_type pair_type
#>    <chr>        <chr>          <dbl> <chr>        <chr>    
#>  1 Sepal.Width  Sepal.Length      NA NA           NA       
#>  2 Petal.Length Sepal.Length      NA NA           NA       
#>  3 Petal.Width  Sepal.Length      NA NA           NA       
#>  4 Species      Sepal.Length      NA NA           NA       
#>  5 Petal.Length Sepal.Width       NA NA           NA       
#>  6 Petal.Width  Sepal.Width       NA NA           NA       
#>  7 Species      Sepal.Width       NA NA           NA       
#>  8 Petal.Width  Petal.Length      NA NA           NA       
#>  9 Species      Petal.Length      NA NA           NA       
#> 10 Species      Petal.Width       NA NA           NA
